secret_rule: Only items that are associated with a constellation or celestial body can be brought to the picnic.

conversation.content: To start, here are some examples of items you can bring: "telescope" and "star map".

Correct! The rule is: Only items that are associated with a constellation or celestial body can be brought to the picnic.
